resources.string: Service not connected, restart your phone.
Hey there! I am using WhatsAuto App.
Add one or more contact to the list.
Turn ON notification for WhatsAuto app.
(Note: Auto reply works only when you receive message notification.)
Share with your friends and family.

Hi, did you know?
You can send automatic reply to incoming messages to any social messaging apps, when you're busy, it's free today for download.
Check this out!
Learn how to use the app.
To see incoming message notification, allow WhatsAuto app to access to your contact list.
Something went wrong, please try again later.
This will delete all your saved status.
Schedule time to turn WhatsAuto app automatically on or off.
Set time to turn WhatsAuto app automatically ON.
Set time to turn WhatsAuto app automatically OFF.
Play notification sound when WhatsAuto app turn ON or OFF automatically.
I am busy, text you later.
I am driving, text you later.
I am sleeping, text you later.
At the movie, text you later.
In a meeting, text you later.
Whenever you receive message notification message, it will reply automatically.
Note: Auto-reply will not work when you\'re chatting with the person or the chat is muted.
If auto-reply did not work, try restarting your device.
Share WhatsAuto app with your friends and family.
Don\'t send a reply immediately to the same person, wait for %1$s for the next auto-reply.

- Say goodbye to Ads forever.
- Automatic turn ON/OFF feature.
- Backup and restore your custom reply messages to online drive.
- Automatic sheet sync feature.
- Driving mode.
- 24/7 customer support.
This feature is available only for premium users, upgrade to premium version now and enjoy access to this feature.
Thank you for purchasing WhatsAuto app. You\'re now a premium user. Enjoy all benefits of premium features.
Remove Auto Reply header text from the reply message.
Secure access to WhatsAuto app by using the same Pattern/PIN/Password you use to unlock your phone.
Reply only once to the same person/group until you turn ON auto-reply next time.
Use your phone pattern/pin/password to unlock.
App lock will not work if your phone pattern/pin/password is set to none.
Congratulations! You\'re now premium user for one day.
This version of WhatsAuto app become obsolete. Please go to the Google Play Store to download the latest version.
Tap to enable Auto Reply support for following apps.
To create custom reply text, tap + at bottom of your screen.
Tap to edit. Swipe to delete.
New Version of WhatsAuto app is available, update it from play store.
Send message to anyone without saving their contact
Add one or more groups to the list.
Now you can send message directly to anyone without saving their contact.
Now it will send auto reply messages to groups.\nYou can also customize the groups in group settings.

1. Click Notification Access button.
2. Turn OFF and ON WhatsAuto app in the Notification Access screen.
3. Automatic reply will work now.
If it doesn't work please swipe left to try next method.

Please make sure you are getting a notification from your messaging app such as WhatsApp, Telegram, etc… whenever you receive a new message. Click Settings button and go to Notifications and turn on notification for your messaging apps.
Please restart your phone and check it again. If none of these methods works, please contact us.
If the incoming keyword exactly matches the incoming message from your messaging app then the reply message will be sent.
If an incoming message from your messaging app contains one of your incoming keywords, a reply message will be sent.
Backup your custom reply messages to your phone\'s storage or Google Drive as (.xls) file. You can restore them whenever you want.
You do not have any messages to backup.
Are you sure want to clear all custom reply messages ?
Your custom reply messages are successfully backed up.
Auto reply may not work if the notifications are disabled in the android settings. Please click settings and go to notifications in android settings and turn ON notification for your messaging apps.
Restore your (.xls) custom reply messages file from your Phone\'s storage or Google Drive.

{%1$s} - will be replaced with the name of the person sending you a message.

{%2$s} - will be replaced with the first name of the person sending you a message.

{%3$s} - will be replaced with the last name of the person sending you a message.
Downloading from google drive, please wait…
I have tried all the methods in \"Not working ?\" screen, still it is not working.
Backup your status to Google Drive. Restore them whenever you want.
Tap here to learn more about creating a spreadsheet in google sheet.
Add your Google Sheets to send an auto-reply message from your spreadsheet. You can create, edit the spreadsheet online, and sync it any time.
Uh no… You don\'t have any spreadsheets in your google sheet. Create one and then sync it.
Attach screenshot of WhatsAuto app home screen.
New version of WhatsAuto is available, update the app now.

1. Go to https://www.google.com/sheets
2. Create a spreadsheet with any name.
3. Type your incoming messages in column \"A\" and your reply message in column \"B\".
4. Now tap Sync button in this app and choose your spreadsheet to sync all your messages automatically.
Hi, we no longer support status feature, you can find all your saved status in your file manager under WhatsAuto folder.
1. Click Notification Access button below, you will be navigate to notification access screen.
2. Turn OFF and ON WhatsAuto in the notification access screen.
3. Auto reply should work now, if still not working, try next step.
1. Make sure you are getting a notification from your messaging apps like the image below whenever someone sends you a message.

2. Auto reply will work only if you get notifications from your messaging apps. If you\'re not getting notifications, click settings button below and find your messaging app and enable notifications, make sure notification is not blocked.
1. Restart your phone and check the auto reply, it should work now or else contact support or ask the community users about your issue.
2. Please note that Auto Reply will not work if you are chatting with that person or the chat is muted.
Auto reply to everyone except your phone contacts.

Everyone - To send auto reply to all your incoming messages.
My contact list - To send auto reply only to your contact list you\'ve added in WhatsAuto app.
Except my contact list - To send auto reply except your WhatsAuto contact list.
Except my phone contacts - To send auto reply except your phone contact list.
Turn on WhatsAuto automatically when the phone screen is locked and idle.
Turn on WhatsAuto automatically when driving.
Are you sure want to delete all notifications ?
1. Sometimes working and sometimes not? then click battery optimize button below -> All apps -> disable WhatsAuto app.
2. If you have any energy saver app or background restriction app, please disable for this app.

⭑ Phones like %s may stop the app working after some time, please go to the android settings and allow the WhatsAuto app to run in the background and disable all the background restriction and battery optimisation for the WhatsAuto app.\n\n⭑ If you need step by step instructions, please visit https://dontkillmyapp.com and look for your device name and follow the steps.

Some phones may stop the WhatsAuto app from working in the background. 

1. Click settings button below to go to the WhatsAuto android settings. 
2. Then click the Advanced option in the WhatsAuto app info screen. 
3. Click Battery settings and disable Background restriction for the WhatsAuto app. 
4. Click Battery optimisation and disable it for the WhatsAuto app.

Allow the WhatsAuto app to run in the background and disable all other background and battery restriction for the WhatsAuto app.
3. If you have more than 10 unread conversations in your messaging app, please make sure to mark all of them as read.
Create your own chatbot by customising incoming and reply messages.
Send only custom reply and spreadsheet messages.
Send a welcome message when someone messages you the first time.
Send a welcome message when someone messages you the first time or %1$s once.
Welcome, thank you for contacting me, I will get back to you shortly.
Xiaomi phone users please enable auto start for this app in your android settings.
No reply messages found for statistics
This is a premium feature, to view all the recipients of this reply message, upgrade to premium.
We do not collect any of your statistics information, all the informations are stored locally in your phone.
Are you sure want to reset statistics?
Please allow permission for Physical activity
For better assistance please visit the link https://dontkillmyapp.com/ and find your device name and follow the step by step instructions.

1. WhatsAuto will send a incoming message from your messaging app to your configured server URL.

2. Once your server respond back with the reply message, WhatsAuto will send it to your messaging app.

3. That's it!! Simple isn't ?
name of the incoming message app
sender name of the incoming message
No \"reply\" parameter found in the response.
Configure your server URL to get a reply for incoming messages.
Send all incoming messages to your server and get a reply.
Turn on or off messaging apps to send auto reply.
You are using an Unofficial version of WhatsAuto app, please download the official app from play store or contact support@whatsauto.app.
Send custom reply and spreadsheet messages without any delay.
Are you sure want to log out of %s ?
Have you read our FAQ yet?
Auto-reply is off, please turn it On
Please change your contact option to send auto-reply to Everyone or add WhatsAuto to your contact list.
You have set a time delay for auto-reply, please wait for some time.
You have set an auto-reply to reply once, turn off and on auto-reply to send again.
No reply message found, please check your incoming message keyword.
The server response doesn\'t contain \"reply\" value.
Hi! You can test your auto-reply by sending a message to this chat.
Test your auto-reply message with this simulation tool.
Connect your Dialogflow agent to WhatsAuto.
Find your Dialogflow project ID in Dialogflow general settings.
Find language in Dialogflow languages settings.
Please enter your Dialogflow language code.
Send all incoming messages to your Dialogflow agent and get a reply.
The name of the person sending you a message will be sent as a reply message.
The first name of the person sending you a message will be sent as a reply message.
The last name of the person sending you a message will be sent as a reply message.
Do you want to save this statistics messages as PDF?
To download your statistics report upgrade to premium or watch free Ad.
Something went wrong, please contact support team.
If you enjoy using this app, please take a moment to help us by rating it.
Please rate us on Play Store
Wait time, reply once, screen lock reply.
Messages will sync automatically when you add or change any data in your spreadsheet. The new changes will take effect only after the auto-reply is sent.
Hi, I\'m your WhatsAuto assistant. I will help you fix your auto-reply issue. Please answer the questions below.
Do you receive a notification for every incoming message from your messaging app with a reply button? Like the image below.

Please go to your messaging app settings and enable notifications.

1. Click the settings button below and find your messaging app and click on it. 
2. Then click the Notifications option in the app info screen. 
3. Enable show notifications.

Auto-reply will work only if you get a notification from your messaging app.
Did you try the test reply feature in the app?\n\nPlease click the link below to go to the test reply feature in the app and send a test message to check the auto-reply.
Is your messaging app is enabled in the supported apps in the WhatsAuto?\n\nPlease make sure your messaging app is enabled in the supported apps in WhatsAuto.
1. Click the notification access button below. \n2. Turn OFF and ON WhatsAuto in the notification access screen like the image below. \n3. Now test the auto-reply it should work now.
Send a reply based on the previous reply message.
Menu-based chatbot. Create a list of menus to send it as an auto-reply.

Create a menu message and list below.
1. List option. 
2. List option. 
3. List option.
Are you sure want to delete
Are you sure want to delete everything?
Are you sure want to delete this sub-menu?
Send a list of menus as a reply message.
The current date will be sent as an auto-reply.
The current time will be sent as an auto-reply.
We have upgraded a menu reply version. For better performance please delete your old menu reply messages and create a new one.
Do not reply mode is set
The incoming message will be sent as a reply message.
Create notes to share with other messaging apps easily.
Tap + at the bottom of the screen to create notes. Tap the share icon to share the note easily with other apps.
Shortcut not supported, please contact support
Are you sure want to delete?

Are you having trouble with the FB Messenger app? 

1. Click the settings button below. 
2. Then go to the Advanced option and click Display over other apps. 
3. Enable "Allow display over other apps" for messenger. 
That's it, check the auto-reply for messenger now.
One time payment.\nPay once. Enjoy lifetime benefits.

If you are using more than one Gmail account on your phone then please uninstall the WhatsAuto app and go to Play Store and choose the right Gmail account you purchased the premium and download the app again. Sometimes updating the app using the wrong Gmail account may lead to a free account.
1. Why my premium account became free account?
2. I have paid for the premium but my account is still free, why?
Please try to make a payment using your debit or credit card. There was an issue with other payment methods such as UPI, Google Pay, etc. Contact our support team for alternate payment.
You can add multiple Incoming Keyword separated by a comma. Example: One, Two, Three
You are receiving this email because you have enabled an email alert for the above reply message. To stop receiving email alerts, disable the reply alert option in the app.
An email alert will be sent to your Signed-in email account whenever this reply message is sent.
group name of the incoming message
phone number of the sender from your contact list
Screen lock reply is enabled. Reply will send only if the phone screen is locked.
Send reply only when the phone screen is locked
You must set a screen lock in your phone to activate this feature.
You have enabled Stop Reply for this message. Auto-reply will not be sent to a particular chat if this menu option is chosen. Turn off and on auto-reply to start sending a reply back.
Stop Reply is activated for this recipient. Reply will no longer send until you turn off and on auto-reply.
Stop sending a reply to a particular chat if this menu option is chosen. Turn off and on auto-reply to start sending a reply back.
Add option to go back to the main menu in the reply message.
Add option to go back to the previous menu in the reply message.
Send a reply message if the wrong or invalid menu option is chosen.
Sorry, please choose the correct menu option again.
Did you turn on auto-reply today?
Turn on auto-reply to send automatic replies.
Reduce your work by turning on auto-reply.
Let the auto-reply answer all your incoming messages to reduce your work.
Auto-reply will take care of all your incoming messages, let\'s turn it on.
Separate menu message, menu list, and previous menu option with a new line.
If you have a problem with any of the messaging apps listed below, please click on it. Otherwise, contact support@whatsauto.app.
Auto-reply only works on one active Instagram account. If you have more than one account in your Instagram app, please remove the other account.
Create a new spreadsheet in your Google Sheet and sync the data.
Show emoji for sub-menu list options.
Please add the spreadsheet to auto-sync.
Go to Google Sheets and open or create your spreadsheet with any name.
Type any incoming message keyword in COLUMN A. Ex: Hi, Hello, Hey
Type your reply message in the COLUMN B. Ex: Hello, how are you?
Now come back to the app and add the spreadsheet you have created. That\'s it.
- Delete your account from WhatsAuto.\n- Erase all your data in the app.
We\'re sorry to see you leave. If you need any help, please contact us at support@whatsauto.app
For security reasons, please sign-in again.
